item.description:
Join us at Historic Fanueil Hall the "Cradle of Liberty"

We have a great lineup of speakers including:

Gary Johnson - former governor of New Mexico (CONFIRMED)
Stewart Rhodes - founder of Oath Keepers (CONFIRMED)
Sheriff Richard Mack - author of "County Sheriff, America's Last Hope" (CONFIRMED)
G Edward Griffin - author of "The Creature from Jekyll Island" (CONFIRMED)
David R. Gillie - Rediscovery of the American Civic Creed (CONFIRMED)
Carla Howell - advocate for smaller government (CONFIRMED)
Jen Coffey - second amendment sisters (CONFIRMED)
Adam Kokesh - Iraqi veterans against the war (CONFIRMED)
Gary Franchi - founder of Restore the Republic (CONFIRMED)
Jordan Page - liberty songwriter/musician (CONFIRMED)
Leon Everette - American Patriot Liberty Musician (CONFIRMED)
Pastor Garrett Lear - The patriot pastor and pastor to patriots (CONFIRMED)

General admission tickets for $25.00 ea. and $30.00 at the door.

VIP tickets for $100 ea. - gets you preferred seating in the Faneuil Hall, first 4 rows and dinner*with speakers ( * $25.00 voucher at Durgin Park after the event 6:00-9:00pm)

http://www.masslpa.or...


Bob Dwyer 508-930-5530 or Bob.Dwyer@MassLPA.org
item.how_to_find_us: We Will Be the Ones Defending Liberty, Honor and Integrity!
item.name: Boston Tea Party 12/12, Stewart Rhodes, Sheriff Richard Mack, G Edward Griffin,
